members.signatureBeforeChange: public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)

diff: -	int width = dim.w * 7; int height = dim.h;

+	* handle size. Add extra space for the rest.

members.signatureBeforeChange: public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)
diff: +	* Feature in WinCE PPC.  Text labels have a trim
+	* of one pixel wide on the right and left side.
+	* The fix is to increase the size.
